title: New YouTuber check out my channel for montages and other content :)
body: please give me some support by either liking or subscribing to my channel, going to be doing hopefully daily uploads and more :) thanks guys :)

replies.body:
I can see improvement from your Kassadin upload already. The transitions are less jolty. So good job :)

If you can, when editing the audio to the clips, try to sync the music with the video (i.e. a down beat on a kill, or a crescendo just before an epic engage).

thankyou so much for the feedback my friend :D, yeah im going to try do that in the next one, also gonna try get more of the game sounds in there too just make it a little bit better with audio, thanks once again for the feedback!
hahaha im not taking clips at the moment, but i was thinking of doing a community montage maybe? sometime in the future hopefully XD
